company.name: Swedish API License
company.summary: A user agreement for companies that publishes an API. Very adaptable to different legal and business requirements. Based on the Laws of Sweden and published under Creative Commons.
company.details: A user agreement for companies that publishes an API. Very adaptable to different legal and business requirements. Based on the Laws of Sweden and published under Creative Commons.

company.name: Terms of Service Didn't Read
company.summary: “I have read and agree to the Terms” is the biggest lie on the web. We aim to fix that. Terms of service are often too long to read, but it's important to understand what's in them. Your rights online depend on them. We hope that our ratings can help you get informed abour your rights.

company.name: TOSBack
company.summary: TOSBack is a collaboration between theEFF, theInternet Society, andToS;DR. Every day, we check the Terms and Policies of many online services to see if any of them have changed. The project is currently in beta as we are working on some improvements to ensure greater reliability and coverage. For now, please double check any results with	the website operator before relying on them for important le
company.details: TOSBack is a collaboration between theEFF, theInternet Society, andToS;DR. Every day, we check the Terms and Policies of many online services to see if any of them have changed. The project is currently in beta as we are working on some improvements to ensure greater reliability and coverage. For now, please double check any results with	the website operator before relying on them for important legal or journalistic purposes.
